page.title: 05Plants near Nercwys & Eryrys
page.content: In such a small area the variety of plants and trees is wide. The main influence on the vegetation seems to be altitude, depth and type of soil and amount of sunlight. {Flowers} Wild flowers are plentiful and varied. On one day in September about 30 varieties were observed in flower. Most common varieties were vetches, yarrow, red dead nettle and heather. In low lying land there are many hedgerow flowers, especially where the ground has been undisturbed. Unfortunately, where the surface soil is damaged by heavy vehicles, nettle, dock and rose bay willow herb tend to take over to the exclusion of other varieties. The high land has areas of heath plants such as heather, gorse, bilberry and bracken.
